attributes.review: This app took so long to download! It also hacked everything on my phone !!! If you see this don’t waste your time on this app. Instead go support something that’s actually worth it.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER !!!

attributes.review: This app is so bad, I do not recommend getting it. Do not waste your time on this garbage! The app was poorly designed and it would drain my battery. It’s just a horrible app in every way do do not get it!
attributes.title: Absolutely terrible

attributes.review: First I tried to download it and it took 4 DAYS!!!! What app takes that long ?! Then I got Covid-19 from it ?! All I was trying to do was track the progress!!! ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE!! DO NOT DOWNLOAD!!!
attributes.title: Absolutely horrendous app

attributes.review: This app is weird, once i opened the app it said “are you lost baby gurl” and i was like no. Then i started to go through the app and all i could hear was “i see red, red,ohhhh redddd” and then i had a feeling i was drowning or something. But thats not even the worst...they showed me a picture of cheeto dust? I thought this app was for trump. What ever you do, dont get it.
attributes.title: Dont get it.

attributes.review: Listen I download this app and the second I opened it I scream. Trumps face is all over it. Then it started spamming me with glitches like noooooo
attributes.title: Just nooooo

attributes.review: That’ll is extremely laggy it spread a virus to my phone I got a notification that my phone was hacked I love our president but this is unacceptable please keep the website up but get rid of the app
attributes.title: Take it down 🥰🧚🏾✨❤️💞💖

attributes.review: I was very excited to download this beautiful app, but it took HOURS to get on my phone, and mind you I have good Wi-fi connection, yet this app took 7.913 hours to download and I couldn’t use my phone or wifi for anything else, since the app would stop downloading. Now when the app finally started working on my phone, it glitched right afterward. My phone screen went completely black and I couldn’t turn on my phone for hours!!! I’m not sure what was wrong, but I’m definitely not using this app ever again honey 🙃😟😬
attributes.title: stopped working right after download

attributes.review: After downloading this app I started getting ads for penis enlarging equipment and toupee’s made from real ferret fur. Also what does Orange lives matter mean? I see trump saying that a lot in his live videos.. looks like he’s crying in some sort of bunker with naked pics of Obama. Also, fun fact! The average trump supporters IQ is 5 and average trump supporter penis size is .5 inches.
attributes.title: Orange lives matter

attributes.review: I downloaded this app recently, was so excited to get it to keep track of my hunky President Trump 😍😍 Oh Melainia you’re sooooooo lucky!!!!!!! 🍀 🍀💞💞 But then I started getting weird texts and calls. This man called me and said he got all my information and needed $10,000 to not go to my home and Kill me. He said he has my address from this apps location services!!!!!! 😱😱 I’m so scared that I called the cops!!!!! My phone is like a brick now, it hardly works and this app is always running something in the background. All of my info was stolen, my emails were hacked and deleted, and now I’m getting calls from people saying they have my information. Im so scared and wish that I hadn’t downloaded this app in the first place.  Such crap that all my info is stolen!!!!!! 😡 😡
attributes.title: APP STOLE MY INFO
